topic.title: 5.4.1 Disposal of Waste Oil, Waste Fluids and Waste Materials

header.para: Disposal of Waste Oil, Waste Fluids and Waste Materials

para.text: Dispose of liquids such as cutting fluid, grease, hydraulic oil and lubricant, and chips or graphite dust, all of which are discharged during operation of this machine, in accordance with the laws, regulations, and ordinances established in your country.
Also, separate and dispose of recyclable materials properly.
